alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Furnas; Gosper; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Kearney; Merrick; Nance; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:56AM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and south of Highway 30 there could be ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions may develop in time to impact the Wednesday morning commute, but there is greater confidence in impacts to the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please expect at least minor adjustments to later snowfall forecasts, as confidence levels in snow amounts at any given location is currently considered only medium. This is due to continued uncertainty in the exact storm track, and the location of a likely sharp transition from heavy snow to wintry mix.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Furnas; Gosper; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Kearney; Merrick; Nance; Phelps
